AddImageIncidentSamplesOptions.description: The request to add incident samples to an Image Incident.

AddImageIncidentSamplesResult.description: The response of adding incident samples to an Image Incident.

incidentSamples.description: Array of incidentSamples have been added.

AddOrUpdateTextBlocklistItemsOptions.description: The request to add blocklistItems to a text blocklist.

AddOrUpdateTextBlocklistItemsResult.description: The response of adding blocklistItems to the text blocklist.

blocklistItems.description: Array of blocklistItems have been added.

AddTextIncidentSamplesOptions.description: The request to add incident samples to a Text Incident.

AddTextIncidentSamplesResult.description: The response of adding incident samples to a Text Incident.

AnalyzeImageDetectIncidentsOptions.description: The request to analyze given image with content safety Image Incidents defined.

categories.description: The categories will be analyzed. If they are not assigned, a default set of analysis results for the categories will be returned.

outputType.description: This refers to the type of image analysis output. If no value is assigned, the default value will be "FourSeverityLevels".

values.name: FourSeverityLevels
values.description: Output severities in four levels, the value could be 0,2,4,6.

AnalyzeImageWithTextOptions.description: The request to analyze an image with embedded or custom text.

image.description: The image content to be analyzed.

text.description: The text related to the given image.

categories.description: The harm categories to be detected. A default set of harm categories will be applied if omitted.

enableOcr.description: When set to true, the embedded text in given image will be recognized and concatenated with the given text for analysis.

AnalyzeImageWithTextResult.description: The response of analyzing an image with embedded or custom text.

categoriesAnalysis.description: The individual analysis result for each harm category.

AnalyzeTextCustomCategoryOption.description: The request to analyze given text content with the Custom Category version defined.

text.description: The text needs to be analyzed.

version.description: Custom category version, if not assigned use the latest version.

AnalyzeTextCustomCategoryResult.description: The response of analyzing text with Custom Category.

customCategoryAnalysis.description: The analysis result with Custom Category.

AnalyzeTextDetectIncidentsOptions.description: The request to analyze given text content with content safety Text Incidents defined.

AnalyzeTextGroundednessOptions.description: The request of text groundedness analysis.

domain.description:
The domain of the text for analysis. Allowed values: Medical, Generic.
This field is optional, with a default value of Generic.

values.name: Generic
values.description: The domain for Groundedness analysis - Generic.

values.name: Medical
values.description: The domain for Groundedness analysis - Medical.

task.description:
The task type for the text analysis. Type of task: QnA, Summarization.
This field is optional, with a default value of Summarization.

values.name: Summarization
values.description: The task type for Groundedness analysis - Summarization.

values.name: QnA
values.description: The task type for Groundedness analysis - QnA.

qna.description:
The user's question input in a QnA scenario.
This field is optional, but cannot be omitted when task type is QnA.

text.description: The text to be analyzed. Usually, it's the LLM output and may contain ungrounded content.

groundingSources.description:
The grounding sources to be used for validating the groundedness.
Limit: Restrictions on the total amount of grounding sources that can be analyzed in a single request are 55K characters (in Unicode code point).

correction.description:
A value indicating if to generate mitigated content for the ungrounded content and included in the response.
This field is optional, with a default value of false.

reasoning.description:
A value indicating if to generate an explanation for the groundedness analysis result and included in the response.
This field is optional, with a default value of false.

llmResource.description:
Connection details for the LLM resource. 
This field will be used only when the 'reasoning' field is set to true; otherwise, it will be ignored.

AnalyzeTextGroundednessResult.description: The response of text groundedness analysis.

ungroundedDetected.description: Indicates whether ungrounded content is detected.

ungroundedPercentage.description:
Specifies the proportion of the text identified as ungrounded, 
expressed as a decimal between 0 and 1,
where 0 indicates no ungrounded content and 1 indicates the entire given text is considered ungrounded.

ungroundedDetails.description: Provides insights into ungrounded content with specific examples and percentages.

correctedText.description:
The correction for detected ungroundedness.
It's available only when the 'correction' field in the input is set to true.

text.description: The text to be analyzed. We support a maximum of 10k Unicode characters (Unicode code points) in the text of one request.

categories.description: The categories will be analyzed. If they are not assigned, a default set of analysis results for the categories will be returned.

haltOnBlocklistHit.description: When set to true, further analyses of harmful content will not be performed in cases where blocklists are hit. When set to false, all analyses of harmful content will be performed, whether or not blocklists are hit.

outputType.description: This refers to the type of text analysis output. If no value is assigned, the default value will be "FourSeverityLevels".

values.name: FourSeverityLevels
values.description: Output severities in four levels, the value could be 0,2,4,6.

values.name: EightSeverityLevels
values.description: Output severities in eight levels, the value could be 0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7.

AutoReviewTextOptions.description: The request to analyze the given text with the Auto Reviewer version defined.

autoReviewerName.description: The name of the Auto Reviewer.

autoReviewerVersion.description: The version of the Auto Reviewer. The latest version will be used if omitted.

AutoReviewTextResult.description: The response of analyzing text with Auto Reviewer.

labelName.description: The label classified by the given Auto Reviewer.

reasoning.description: To provide more details of the analysis result.

AutoReviewerLabelDetails.description: The label details of an Auto Reviewer version.

AutoReviewerOperationDetail.description: The details of a long running operation of Auto Reviewer.

error.description: The error details when this operation failed.

AutoReviewerOperationStatus.description: The possible status of an Auto Reviewer operation.

values.name: NotStarted
values.description: Auto Reviewer operation status - NotStarted

values.name: Running
values.description: Auto Reviewer operation status - Running

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: Auto Reviewer operation status - Succeeded

values.name: Failed
values.description: Auto Reviewer operation status - Failed

AutoReviewerVersion.description: Definition of an Auto Reviewer version.

autoReviewerName.description: The name of the Auto Reviewer.

labels.description: The labels defined in the Auto Reviewer. There should be a label named 'Other' in the list. The 'Other' label is the default one to represent the content that does not classified as any other labels.

exampleBlobUrl.description: The blob URL which should be a jsonl that contains the examples of an Auto Reviewer. Read & write access to the upper layer virtual directory is required. This is optional.

blobDelimiter.description: Delimiter of the given blob URL. If omitted, '/' will be used as the delimiter to parse the exampleBlobUrl.

exampleBlobCopyUrl.description: The blob URL that contains a snapshot of exampleBlobUrl. It's available in the response only when exampleBlobUrl is provided in the request.

createdTime.description: The creation time of this Auto Reviewer version. The time is in UTC.

status.description: The status of this Auto Reviewer version.

error.description: The error details of this Auto Reviewer version.

AutoReviewerVersionList.description: All versions of an Auto Reviewer.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

values.name: NotStarted
values.description: The operation has not started.

values.name: Running
values.description: The operation is in progress.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: The operation has completed successfully.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The operation has failed.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: The operation has been canceled by the user.

CodeCitation.description: The code citation of potential protected material for code.

license.description: The license type fetched from source repository.

sourceUrls.description: The repository URLs of the source code detected.

CodeProtectedMaterialAnalysisResult.description: The individual detection result of potential protected material for code.

detected.description: Whether potential protected material is detected or not.

codeCitations.description: The code citation of potential protected material for code.

CustomCategoryLongRunningOperationStatus.description: Custom Category long running operation status result.

CustomCategoryOperationDetail.description: The details of a long running operation of Custom Category.

error.description: The error details when this operation failed.

severity.description: The value increases with the severity of the input content. The value of this field is determined by the output type specified in the request. The output type could be FourSeverityLevels, and the output value can be 0, 2, 4, 6.

ImageData.description: The image can be either base64 encoded bytes or a blob URL. You can choose only one of these options. If both are provided, the request will be refused. The maximum image size is 2048 x 2048 pixels and should not exceed 4 MB, while the minimum image size is 50 x 50 pixels.

content.description: The Base64 encoding of the image.

blobUrl.description: The blob url of the image.

ImageDataResult.description: Definition of an image in a response.

incidentSampleId.description: The name of this incident sample.

image.description: The image content of this incident sample.

severity.description: It indicates the severity of the harm. 0 means the content is considered as safe in this harm category.

ShieldPromptResult.description: The combined analysis results of potential direct or indirect injection attacks.

userPromptAnalysis.description: Direct injection attacks analysis result for the given user prompt.

documentsAnalysis.description: Direct and indirect injection attacks analysis result for the given documents.

blocklistItemId.description: The service will generate a BlocklistItemId, which will be a UUID.

text.description: BlocklistItem content. The length is counted using Unicode code point.

isRegex.description: An optional properties indicating whether this item is to be matched as a regular expression.

blocklistName.description: The name of the matched blocklist.

blocklistItemId.description: The ID of the matched item.

blocklistItemText.description: The content of the matched item.

severity.description: The value increases with the severity of the input content. The value of this field is determined by the output type specified in the request. The output type could be FourSeverityLevels or EightSeverity Levels, and the output value can be 0, 2, 4, 6 or 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7.

sampleBlobUrl.description: The blob URL which should be a jsonl that contains the samples. Read & write access to the upper layer virtual directory is required.

sampleBlobSnapshotUrl.description: The blob URL that contains a snapshot of sampleBlobUrl.

UngroundednessDetails.description: Details of the content that identified as ungroundedness.

offset.description: The offset that the ungrounded content starts in the original text.

reason.description:
The explanation for detected ungroundedness.
It's available only when the 'reasoning' field in the input is set to true.

UserPromptInjectionAnalysisResult.description: The individual analysis result of potential injection attacks in the given user prompt.

attackDetected.description: Whether a potential injection attack is detected or not.
